text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe Pelosi welcomed Coronavirus to pork programs with her agendas. She was not even aware of crisis while President Trump and his team's were working to help Americans. REMOVE HER! She is an obstructionist. TRUMP 2020!
